nvcc   -arch=sm_21 -c --compiler-options -fno-strict-aliasing  -O3 -I/opt/nvidia/latest/cuda/include   -D_DOUBLE -DBLOCKDIM_X=1 -DBLOCKDIM_Y=1 -DBLOCKDIM_Z=1 mmpy_kernel.cu
